title: Reliquary, 16th century
medium: part a/d: gilt metal, enamel; part e: wood
description: Two horizontal rectangular plaques (a, b) with three cast figural busts attached; one cast figure removed from plaque a.  Two vertical rectangular plaques (c, d) with triangular tops; incised decoration depicting standing robed figure holding book(?).  Holes for attachment to casket-shaped chasse core (e).  Parts a/d) gilt worn; losses to inlaid champleve enamel.

tombstone.epitaph: Reliquary, 16th century. part a/d: gilt metal, enamel; part e: wood. 1915-27-17-a/e.
